    • getLastHistoryEntry

      @Nullable public @Nullable HistoryEntry getLastHistoryEntry(File file, boolean ui) throws HistoryException
      Description copied from class: Repository
      This is generic implementation that retrieves the full history of given file and returns the latest history entry. This is obviously very inefficient, both in terms of memory and I/O. The extending classes are encouraged to implement their own version.
      Overrides:
      getLastHistoryEntry in class Repository
      Parameters:
      file - file
      Returns:
      last history entry or null
      Throws:
      HistoryException - on error

    • traverseHistory

      Description copied from class: RepositoryWithHistoryTraversal
      Traverse history of given file/directory.
      Specified by:
      traverseHistory in class RepositoryWithHistoryTraversal
      Parameters:
      file - File object
      sinceRevision - start revision (non-inclusive)
      tillRevision - end revision (inclusive)
      numCommits - maximum number of commits to traverse (use null as unlimited)
      visitors - list of ChangesetVisitor objects
      Throws:
      HistoryException - on error
